message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1300000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to me.

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $1200000. This is my final offer.
